title: New: Matilda – Blood
body:
A desolate, abandoned building.

A single, black and white photo. “**Matilda**” knows how to play the game, but don’t let that detract from what is a stunning, emotionally fraught piece of music. The eerie piano echoes the sentiments of **Matilda**, conjuring up a vivid backdrop for the delicate vocals. Oh and I won’t spoil the surprise, but keep listening until the end, and you’ll either be thoroughly creeped out or, as in my case, utterly amazed.
